modName: Trocole Weapons Pack by Aldu - 10 totally new weapons
summary: New Weapons pack include 4 one-handed swords (one with 5 texture variations) and 2 two-handed swords. In totally 10 weapons.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds new weapons to the game.

Clarification: This isn\'t a serious mod, is one of the first things I do and I\'m not a modder. Don\'t be cruel.

- - - New Weapons pack include 4 one-handed swords (one with 5 texture variations) and 2 two-handed swords:

- Trocole Frozen Sword
- Trocole Frozen two-handed
- Trocole Alabarda
- Trocole Alabarda two-handed
- Dorada Trocole
- Trocole V1
- Trocole V2
- Trocole V3
- Trocole V4
- Trocole V5
 In totally 10 weapons.

Instructions:

Drag and drop all the files on the Skyrim folder called \"data\"  and active the .esp file.

To find weapons type the command key and write \"help trocole\" or you can craft these at the forge:
- Trocole Frozen Sword and Trocole Frozen two-handed at Glass Smithing and the others at Daedric Smithing.

These weapons actually i did for my personal use, but I Decided to make a pack and upload it. I made ??these weps quite some time ago, then unfortunately I cant make changes or Improve textures because I lost the original files with I was doing it.
The issue that you can see on the pictures (the hand crosses the texture) I\'ve solved, but the pictures are old. Don\'t worry.

If you like my work endorse me :)

----------------------=========Enjoy=========------------------------
author: Aldu
